name: bureaucromancy
description:
You're the chief worshipper at your local temple, and that means you're the boss. And everyone needs your help, whether it's to fix unexpected problems or just keep things running smoothly. But some of your employees might need a little more help than others.

Arrow keys to move and interact.

Made with Bitsy HD by Fred Bednarski (based on Bitsy by Adam Le Doux). This game also uses the exit-from-dialog hack by Sean.
